scripts.back-install: cd udagram && cd udagram-api && npm i
scripts.front-install: cd udagram && cd udagram-frontend && npm i
scripts.back-build: cd udagram && cd udagram-api && npm-run-all clean build
scripts.front-build: cd udagram && cd udagram-frontend && npm-run-all lint build
scripts.back-start: cd udagram && cd udagram-api && npm run start
scripts.front-start: cd udagram && cd udagram-frontend && npm run start
scripts.back-deploy: cd udagram && cd udagram-api && npm run deploy
scripts.front-deploy: cd udagram && cd udagram-frontend && npm run deploy
